document_data.name: Mossy Deathcap
document_data.mainbody: '''Mossy deathcap''' was a type of [[mushroom]] that was [[poison|toxic]] to non-[[plant creature]]s.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Tyranny's Bleak Depths|15,18}}
document_data.Description: These mushrooms were speckled with [[moss]] and grew in dense clusters. They were not only toxic but highly unstable: walking across a patch without care caused a cloud of poisonous spores to be launched into the air. Destroying a mossy deathcap neutralized its toxic spores.
document_data.Ecology:
These mushrooms infested patches of moss, including [[oblivion moss]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Tyranny's Bleak Depths|11}}

They could be found underground, such as beneath the [[Delhalls]] in [[Vaasa]].
